messages:
Name: Davinson Sánchez
Nationality: Colombia
Date of Birth: June 12, 1996
Position: Defender
Current club: Tottenham Hotspur
Premier League clubs played for: Tottenham Hotspur

Defender Davinson Sánchez plays for Tottenham Hotspur and has appeared in one Premier League match in 2023/2024 overall and accumulated 76 minutes of playing time. That appearance came as a substitute.
The last Premier League appearance that Sánchez made came on August 13 for Tottenham Hotspur versus Brentford; a match that he played 76 minutes in during a 2-2 draw. He has been booked once.
In the club's next Premier League match on September 16, Tottenham Hotspur - who are in second place in the standings on 10 points - face a home match against Sheffield United.
Last season for Tottenham Hotspur, Sánchez made 18 Premier League appearances.
Sánchez joined Tottenham Hotspur in August 2017 from Ajax, for whom he made 32 league appearances in total, scoring six goals and providing two assists.

The defender debuted in a Premier League fixture for Tottenham Hotspur on August 27, 2017 as a substitute versus Burnley at the age of 21 years and 76 days. In his Premier League career overall, he has played 143 times in the competition, with three goals and just one assist.
